content: With the Loong Scales, you'll be able to interact with the sandfall and remove it as a barrier, revealing a door behind it to take you into the Black Loong's lair.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Black_Loong.md', within the main section titled 'Black Loong', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Black Loong'.
The content is as follows:
With the Loong Scales, you'll be able to interact with the sandfall and remove it as a barrier, revealing a door behind it to take you into the Black Loong's lair.
